findings.title: Rounding error
findings.description: Rounding errors occur due to division before multiplication in certain calculations.

findings.title: Incomplete logic
findings.description: The function comment indicates a reward calculation for per user, but the logic is not implemented.

findings.title: Excessive owner privileges
findings.description: The owner can perform various critical functions without restriction, such as updating liquidity lock, changing txFee, withdrawing tokens, and more.
findings.location: Various functions related to owner privileges
